title: Hive Assault: Purge of Sector 7-G
description: Lead a squad through a hive city's underbelly to eliminate a genestealer cult. Fast-paced combat and tactical decisions.

scenes.name: Drop Zone
scenes.description: Your drop pod crashes into the hive's upper levels. Smoke and debris fill the air. Enemy contacts detected.

events.text: 'Brethren, form up! For the Emperor and Ultramar!'

scenes.name: Hab District
scenes.description: Cramped living quarters. Civilians flee in terror. Cult ambush imminent.

events.text: Cultists pour from the shadows! Contact front!

scenes.name: Cult Hideout
scenes.description: A defiled shrine to the Four-Armed Emperor. Alien ichor stains the walls.

events.text: The Patriarch emergesâ€”massive, alien, utterly abominable. This ends here!

items.name: Godwyn Pattern Bolter
items.description: Standard Astartes bolter. Emperor's Wrath incarnate.

npcs.name: Brother Marcus
npcs.description: Your tactical support. Reliable and steadfast.

npcs.name: Brother Titus
npcs.description: Heavy weapons specialist. Brings the firepower.

npcs.name: Cult Ambush Squad
npcs.description: Fanatical cultists armed with autoguns and improvised weapons.

npcs.name: Genestealer Patriarch
npcs.description: Ancient, cunning, and deadly. Leader of the cult.
